testSteps.description: (/products-and-docs/tutorials/) Verification for all the page's links #1: {elementKey=Adding Event Discovery Widget Button, pageURL={url}/products-and-docs/tutorials/widgets/Event_Discovery_Widget.html, pageTitle=//h1}

children.description: Given open Tutorials page
Open page
When check visibility and click {Adding Event Discovery Widget Button} element of Tutorials page
Validate and click element: Adding Event Discovery Widget Button
Then check that new page opened from Tutorials page has {{url}/products-and-docs/tutorials/widgets/Event_Discovery_Widget.html} and {//h1}
Check if page is opened: {url}/products-and-docs/tutorials/widgets/Event_Discovery_Widget.html, //h1, http://127.0.0.1:4000
